sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RAKE is a well-known instrument with teeth, by which the ground is divided. See Agriculture.

Rake of a Ship is all that part of her hull which hangs over both ends of her keel. That which is before is called l↑ ∖ efοre-rake or rahc forward, and that part which is at the setting on of the stem-post is called the rake-αft or afterward.
